about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a family construction company with years of experience in the field.
about.description1: We are a family construction company with years of experience in the field. We specialize in apartment and house renovations, masonry work, tiling, paving and other construction services in Prague and surrounding areas.
about.description2: We approach each project with emphasis on quality, reliability and client satisfaction. We believe in transparent communication, fair prices and delivery of results that last.
